author: COMSOL
description: Light pipes are structures that can be used to transport light between different locations. In general, they can be divided into two major groups: tubes lined with a reflective coating and transparent solids that contain light via total internal reflection. In this example, light is transported through a bent light pipe by total internal reflection. The effect of the pipe shape on the transmittance is investigated.
label: light_pipe.mph
